resources.string: Data cannot be accessed without user\'s active confirmation

PEPP-PT will sense other PEPP-PT apps in your proximity and saves this encounter securely on your phone only.

If some other PEPP-PT user who was in your close proximity for a couple of minutes is tested positive for COVID-19 the app is able to notify you.

No username or personal information is required.
No username or personal information required
We need your consent and confirmation to:
Save PEPP-PT signals on your phone
I agree to the Terms & Conditions and I want to contribute my proximity information to PEPP-PT in a pseudonymous manner for fast infection chain analysis.
These permissions are required for the app to work correctly:
PEPP-PT will never access location information or GPS on your phone. The Android OS requires to get this permission in order for Bluetooth to work correctly with PEPP-PT.
The app uses Bluetooth Low Energy and scans your proximity to find other PEPP-PT apps. If other PEPP-PT apps are found, the app will save this encounter locally on your phone.
To allow proper operation in the background e.g. while surfing the web, messaging or listening to music, the app needs extended permission to set battery optimization settings for itself.
I agree to the Terms & Conditions and I want to contribute my proximity information to PEPP-PT in a pseudonymous manner for fast infection chain analysis.
Your PEPP-PT proximity tracer is active!
Do I need to do anything?
No - PEPP-PT will just run in the background. Only and if someone else who was very close to you over a couple of minutes was tested positive for COVID-19, then you might get a notification.

If you received a notification, please consult your physician or test center. Make sure to distance yourself from others and try to self-quarantine. Contact your health-authorities for help:\n0800-HELPCOVID19\nIf you want to provide your data and received a notification, follow the advise of your doctor or health authority.
No need to upload your data. Only in the case you are notified.
To activate the Upload, please call this number and follow the instructions of the employee

Thank you very much, the app has done its job and is now stopping. You can now uninstall it. If you want to continue collecting data, you must reinstall the app. This is necessary to ensure data protection.
PEPP-PT proximity sensor active in the background.
Important permissions are missing for starting the PEPP-PT service.
The Bluetooth service was enabled again.
These permissions are required for running the app on your phone.
PEPP-PT will never access location information or GPS on your phone. The Android OS requires to get this permission in order for Bluetooth to work correctly with PEPP-PT.
The app uses Bluetooth Low Energy and scans your proximity to find other PEPP-PT apps. If other PEPP-PT apps are found, the app will save this encounter locally on your phone.
To allow proper operation in the background. e.g. while surfing the web, messaging, or listening to music, the app needs extended permission to set battery optimization settings for itself.
ERROR: No reply when requesting TOKEN!
ERROR: PEPP-PT backend cannot be contacted!
Attention, you have an important message
Please touch to get the details
A PEPP-PT permssion request needs your attention.
PEPP-PT uses Bluetooth Low Energy to find other PEPP-PT apps.
The PEPP-PT cannot function without access to Bluetooth - this permission unfortunately also requires location access permssion.
Background access to location is required for the Bluetoth background activity of the PEPP-PT tracer.
To allow proper operation in the background. e.g. while surfing the web, messaging, or listening to music, the app needs extended permission to set battery optimization settings for itself.
